ComicInfo.Title: Monsters, Misfits, and Madmen, Part 3

ComicInfo.Summary:
Raphael and Michelangelo pay a visit to Old Hob. Turns out the catâ€™s been busy trying to create new mutants while the Turtles have been away! Will Raph and Mike try to stop him? The choice becomes more difficult when Slash reveals a surprise!
